faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I join the student program?
faq.a1: Submit your application through our portal and we'll review your profile within 48 hours
faq.q2: What technologies do you work with?
faq.a2: We work with a wide range of technologies including React, Node.js, Python, AI/ML, and more
faq.q3: Is there any cost to participate?
faq.a3: No, our student program is completely free and you can even earn stipends for your contributions

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Who we are, our vision, our mission, and what drives us forward.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A leading student-driven tech platform focused on developing digital projects and innovative software solutions, relying on student programmers as the core engine of innovation, and empowering them to become an influential and effective technical force, while building an integrated digital ecosystem that drives innovation and tech entrepreneurship in Jordan and the region.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Empowering student programmers and technical talents through a hands-on work environment that includes developing projects and digital platforms under Bitwreckers, delivering advanced software solutions to companies and organizations, and promoting technical innovation and digital entrepreneurship. We focus on transforming creative ideas into applicable digital products while enhancing practical experience and technical skills to tackle real market challenges.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our services and products
faq.contact_title: Didn't find an answer to your question?
faq.contact_subtitle: Our team is always available to answer your inquiries and provide assistance

lms.best_platform: What is the best LMS platform or software?

faq.technology_services: What technical services do you offer?
faq.project_steps: What are the project implementation steps?
faq.multilanguage_rtl: Do you support multi-language and RTL?
faq.training_support: Do you provide training and support?
faq.mobile_ios_android: Do you support iOS and Android?
faq.ui_ux_identity: Do you provide UI/UX and identity?
faq.project_start: How do we start the project?
faq.hosting_server: Do you support hosting and server?
faq.seo_performance: Do you provide SEO and performance optimization?
faq.external_integration: Do you support integration with external systems?
faq.previous_work: Can we see your previous work?
faq.pricing_payment: What are your prices and payment methods?
faq.cms_support: Do you support content management systems?
faq.monitoring_alerts: Do you provide monitoring and alerts?
faq.project_duration: How long does project implementation take?
faq.delivery_documentation: Do you provide delivery and documentation?
faq.client_cloud: Do you support client cloud deployment?
faq.operating_contracts: Do you provide operating contracts for schools and institutes?

answers.lms_best_platform: We develop custom LMS platforms using the latest technologies like React and Node.js, with full support for interactive learning and content management.
answers.student_systems: Yes, we provide comprehensive student management systems including enrollment, academic tracking, grades, and reports.
answers.technology_services: We offer web development, mobile applications, content management systems, external system integration, and cloud solutions.
answers.school_management: Yes, we develop comprehensive school management systems including student, teacher, curriculum, attendance, and absence management.
answers.project_steps: We start with requirements analysis, then design and development, followed by testing and training, and finally deployment and ongoing support.
answers.multilanguage_rtl: Yes, all our products fully support multiple languages and right-to-left (RTL) writing.
answers.training_support: We provide comprehensive user training and 24/7 technical support, plus detailed documentation and user guides.
answers.mobile_ios_android: Yes, we develop native applications for both iOS and Android using the latest technologies like React Native and Flutter.
answers.ecommerce_support: We provide integrated e-commerce solutions including product management, orders, electronic payment, and marketing.
answers.ui_ux_identity: Yes, our design team provides integrated UI/UX services and visual identity development for projects.
answers.security_measures: We apply the highest security standards including data encryption, multi-factor authentication, and protection against cyber attacks.
answers.ai_integration: We integrate artificial intelligence into our solutions to provide smart user experience and advanced analytics.
answers.quality_assurance: We apply comprehensive testing at all development stages to ensure the quality of the final product.
answers.education_management: We provide integrated solutions for educational institution management including student, teacher, curriculum, and assessment management.
answers.services_offered: We offer web development, mobile applications, content management systems, design, integration, and technical consulting.
answers.post_launch_support: Yes, we provide ongoing technical support after launch including maintenance, updates, and technical support.
answers.project_start: We start with an exploratory meeting to understand your requirements, then provide a detailed plan and project timeline.
answers.hosting_server: We provide hosting and server management services with guaranteed high performance, security, and uptime protection.
answers.maintenance_contracts: Yes, we provide comprehensive maintenance contracts including updates, security, and technical support.
answers.data_migration: We provide secure data migration services from old systems to new ones with guaranteed data integrity.
answers.seo_performance: We apply SEO best practices and performance optimization to ensure fast loading and good search engine ranking.
answers.external_integration: We provide integration with all external systems such as payment systems, customer relationship management, and educational systems.
answers.previous_work: You can review our work portfolio on the Portfolio page to see the projects we have successfully completed.
answers.pricing_payment: Our prices are competitive and tiered based on project size. We accept electronic payment and bank transfers.
answers.cms_support: We develop custom content management systems that are easy to use with advanced administrative interfaces.
answers.monitoring_alerts: We provide advanced monitoring systems with real-time alerts to protect sites from technical issues.
answers.school_systems: We develop comprehensive school systems including student, teacher, curriculum, assessment, and grade management.
answers.project_duration: Duration depends on project size, typically 2-6 months for medium projects, and can reach a year for large projects.
answers.lms_sale: We develop custom LMS platforms according to your needs, and we don't have a ready-made product for sale.
answers.development_cost: Cost depends on project requirements, we provide detailed quotes after studying the requirements.
answers.electronic_payment: Yes, we integrate all local and international electronic payment methods in our projects.
answers.nda_support: Yes, we respect complete confidentiality and sign non-disclosure agreements to protect your information.
answers.system_scalability: All our systems are designed to be scalable to meet your future needs.
answers.control_panels: We provide advanced and easy-to-use control panels for managing all aspects of the system.
answers.api_provision: Yes, we provide comprehensive and documented APIs for integration with external systems.
answers.delivery_documentation: We provide all technical documentation, user guides, and comprehensive training with delivery.
answers.client_cloud: We provide secure and reliable cloud solutions with complete infrastructure management.
answers.operating_contracts: Yes, we provide comprehensive operating contracts for educational institutions with guaranteed performance and ongoing support.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, contact us, or use our services. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and project details.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, process transactions, and send you technical notices and support messages.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of certain communications from us at any time.

privacy.questionsSubtitle: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms of service carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Bitwreckers services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

useLicense.title: Use License
useLicense.content: Permission is granted to temporarily use Bitwreckers services for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not modify or copy the materials.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The materials on Bitwreckers website are provided on an "as is" basis. Bitwreckers makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.content: In no event shall Bitwreckers or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Bitwreckers website.

accuracy.title: Accuracy of Materials
accuracy.content: The materials appearing on Bitwreckers website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Bitwreckers does not warrant that any of the materials on its website are accurate, complete, or current.

terms.questionsSubtitle: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us.
